org.kitodo.data.database.beans

Class Batch

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kitodo.data.database.beans.BaseBean
      • org.kitodo.data.database.beans.Batch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @Entity
public class Batch
extends BaseBean
    The class Batch represents a user-definable, unordered collection of processes that methods can be applied on in batch processing.
    Author:
    Matthias Ronge <matthias.ronge@zeutschel.de>
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Batch.Type
      Type of batch: LOGISTIC facilitates the logistics of excavation and processing in the digitisation centre NEWSPAPER forms the complete edition of a newspaper SERIAL forms the complete edition of a serial publication

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Batch()
      Default constructor.
      Batch(Batch.Type type)
      Constructor to create an empty batch object with a given type.
      Batch(Batch.Type type, Collection<? extends Process> processes)
      Constructor to create a batch that holds the given processes.
      Batch(String title, Batch.Type type)
      Constructor to create an empty batch object with a given title and a type.
      Batch(String title, Batch.Type type, Collection<? extends Process> processes)
      Constructor to create a batch with a given title that holds the given processes.

    • Method Detail

      • getTitle

        public String getTitle()
        The function getTitle() returns the batch title. Using titles for batches is optional, the field may be null. If so, the function returns null.
        Returns:
        the batch title

      • setTitle

        public void setTitle(String title)
        The method setTitle() can be used to set a batch title. This function is also required by Hibernate when creating objects from the database.
        Parameters:
        title - for the batch

      • getType

        public Batch.Type getType()
        Returns the batch type.
        Returns:
        the batch type

      • setType

        public void setType(Batch.Type type)
        The method setType() can be used to set a batch title. This function is also required by Hibernate when creating objects from the database.
        Parameters:
        type - for the batch

      • getProcesses

        public List<Process> getProcesses()
        The function getProcesses() return the processes that belong to the batch.
        Returns:
        the processes that are in the batch

      • setProcesses

        public void setProcesses(List<Process> processes)
        The method setProcesses() sets the processes that belong to the batch. This method is also required by Hibernate when creating objects from the database.
        Parameters:
        processes - that belong to the batch
